title: Power - ranking for resistors RX RY and RZ

content.question: Three different resistors are connected to different batteries, as shown in the figures. Which of the following correctly ranks the power <math alttext="P sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></math>, <math alttext="P sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></math>, and <math alttext="P sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></math> dissipated in resistors <math alttext="R sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="R sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="R sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="P sub Y is greater than P sub X, which is greater than P sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="P sub Y is greater than P sub Z, which is greater than P sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="P sub Z is greater than P sub X, which equals P sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="P sub Z is greater than P sub Y, which is greater than P sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="P sub Y is greater than P sub Z, which is greater than P sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
